{{knowledge objective

|Rank=A
|Title=Photograph/video of central facial paralysis
|Description=None
|Rubric=Multimedia content
|Contributors=
|Order=4}}
Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

question.question: What is the best format for photographing facial paralysis?
question.option_a: Photograph from a distance, focusing on the face as a whole
question.option_b: Close-up photograph of the affected area, highlighting the details
question.option_c: Video recording of the patient's facial movements over time
question.option_d: Photograph of the patient's facial expression in a mirror
